function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Switching system architecture from Arduino AVR to ARM Cortex","Impact":"Increased development overhead and potential for compatibility issues","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of the new architecture","Technologies":"Testing tools and validation frameworks","People":"Developers, engineers","Owner":"Development team"},{"Description":"Use of inexpensive but accurate and readily available devices for high performance building applications","Impact":"Potential compromise on measurement accuracy and reliability","Mitigation":"Thorough evaluation and calibration of selected devices","Technologies":"Calibration tools and quality control processes","People":"Building maintenance and operation personnel","Owner":"Building management or operations team"},{"Description":"Selection of sensor parameters based on NABERS Indoor Environment rating scheme","Impact":"May not fully capture all relevant environmental factors for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Supplement with additional sensors targeting specific disease propagation factors","Technologies":"Additional sensor modules for disease-relevant parameters","People":"Building maintenance and operation personnel","Owner":"Building management or operations team"}]}
